message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor.  We can negotiate more in the next round if you think it's unfair.
Your initial offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. I propose a 55/45 split. This accounts for the time value of money with the inflation working against me faster.
Let's meet in the middle this time. I propose a 50/50 split. I think it's fair given the inflation we're both facing.
